name: MonkVsRobots
description:
Monk vs Robots is a new indie game developed on Totem platform (https://oren.cloud.xwiki.com/xwiki/bin/view/Main/)! Choose your monk’s avatar, spear and start to defend your shrine from the attack of enemies. Throw the spear or use melee attack combos to fight the waves of robots which are trying to destroy your shrine.

8 different types of avatar for male and female characters. This makes the playing experience even more exciting! 

A few types of the spear to choose. Spear elements reproduces water, fire, earth and air. 

Lowpoly level design with a number of objects, visuals and obstacles which make the map look and play more interesting. Moreover, 4 different levels based on the water, fire, earth and air elements are coming soon. 

Attention to details. The game includes different types of character animations which make the playing even more alive. 

Monk vs Robots is one of the Totem Game Development Network’s projects. The solution creates an amazing shared game experience. Learn more about Totem here (https://oren.cloud.xwiki.com/xwiki/bin/view/Main/).

Help us to improve the game. 

Our project is on a playtesting phase now. We developed the core functionality and UI to share the game to the world and get a feedback regarding what can be improved. Provide us with a short feedback about your experience with Monk vs Robots and it will greatly help us to imrove the game.   https://forms.gle/TP13qkDgWNEvpYkD8
